com.camerontec.util.jmx.cascading

Class Cascader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.util.spring.components.base.BaseComponentWithName
      • com.camerontec.util.spring.components.base.BaseComponentWithLogger
        • com.camerontec.util.spring.components.base.BaseComponentWithLifeCycle
          • com.camerontec.util.spring.components.base.BaseComponent
            • com.camerontec.util.spring.components.base.BaseExecutableComponent
              • com.camerontec.util.spring.components.base.BaseExecutableComponentPerformingRecurringTask
                • com.camerontec.util.spring.components.base.BaseAutoStartableComponentPerformingRecurringTask
                  • com.camerontec.util.jmx.cascading.Cascader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICascader, IUsesManagedHostsAccessor, IExecutable, IHasLifeCycle, IHasName, IPerformsRecurringTask, Runnable, org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.beans.factory.BeanNameAware

    public class Cascader
extends BaseAutoStartableComponentPerformingRecurringTask
implements ICascader
    This class implements the cascader, which is responsible for mounting the remote MBeans exposed by the LMA of each of the managed hosts into the MA's private MBean server.
    The life-cycle of the cascader is as defined by class BaseExecutableComponent. When the cascader is started, it uses a separate thread which repeatedly attempts to mount the MBeans from the LMAs that are not currently cascaded.
